dict.acceptation: 打猎；追捕，猎杀；在…处狩猎；搜索；
追逐猎物；寻找；前后摆动；积极地寻找；
打猎；狩猎旅行；参加狩猎旅行的人；

sent.orig: According to Hunt and Hess grading: One patient was grade, one grade and one grade.
sent.trans: Hunt和Hess分类：1例为级，1例为级，1例为级。

sent.orig: Results:All patients were conscious, whose Hunt-Hess scale were Grade to.
sent.trans: 结果：本组PNSH患者均无意识障碍，Hunt-Hess分级～级。

sent.orig: Nighteen patients (4.2%) died, without mortality in patient with Hunt and Hess I-II grade.
sent.trans: 死亡19例(4.2%)，其中Hunt-Hess分级～级者手术病死率为0。

sent.orig: The hunt is up! The hunt is up! Forward, everybody!
sent.trans: 追猎开始啦，追猎开始啦！前进！

sent.orig: As the hawk would hunt the rabbit, so shall I hunt you.
sent.trans: 就像老鹰抓兔子一样，我也会抓到你。
